messages.click-to-zoom-image: Click here to open zoom in to image
messages.average-rating-aria-label: This product has an average rating of {averageRating} out of 5 star
messages.review-card-description: Reviews are submitted by our customers directly through our website. We also share reviews from other retailers' websites to help you make an informed decision.
messages.using-product-info-content1: While every care has been taken to ensure product information is correct, food products are constantly being reformulated, so ingredients, nutrition content, dietary and allergens may change.  You should always read the product label and not rely solely on the information provided on the website.
messages.using-product-info-content2: If you have any queries, or you'd like advice on any Tesco brand products, please contact Tesco Customer Services, or the product manufacturer if not a Tesco brand product.
messages.using-product-info-content3: Although product information is regularly updated, Tesco is unable to accept liability for any incorrect information. This does not affect your statutory rights.
messages.using-product-info-content4: This information is supplied for personal use only, and may not be reproduced in any way without the prior consent of Tesco Stores Limited nor without due acknowledgement.
messages.generic-some-error-occurred: Sorry, an error has occurred. Please try later.
messages.delete-review-confirmation-heading-text: Are you sure you want to delete your review?
messages.delete-review-confirmation-body-text: Your review will be removed from our site within a few hours once deleted.
messages.about-marketplace-content-1: We're giving you more choice than ever before. Shop more products from more brands across homewares, beauty, electricals and much more.
messages.about-marketplace-content-2: And all delivered from our partners right to your door.
messages.clubcard-price-schema-description: {title}. Regular price £{regularPrice}, Clubcard price is £{clubcardPrice} available until {endDate}, only available with Clubcard or Tesco app.

messages.delivery-options-specialist-text: Here are your delivery options when ordering Marketplace products that are big or heavy.
messages.exclusions-conditions-standard-text: £{freeDeliveryCriteriaValue} spend doesn't include delivery cost, amount spent on products that need specialist delivery, or Tesco grocery order.
messages.exclusions-conditions-specialist-text: Products that are big or heavy need specialist delivery.

messages.delivery-accordion-standard-heading: Standard delivery - arrives in {minDeliveryDays}-{maxDeliveryDays} working days
messages.delivery-accordion-returns-message: If you're unhappy with any Marketplace product, you can request a return and refund online within {daysToReturn} days. Then you'll need to send your order back to the Marketplace partner. You can't return Marketplace products to a Tesco store.
messages.delivery-accordion-returns-other-message: For more information on how to return specialist products

messages.delivery-accordion-special-standard-head: Specialist standard delivery - arrives in {minDeliveryDays}-{maxDeliveryDays} working days

ProductType:316188524.title: Dove Hydrate Body Wash Shower Gel 450ml

marketing: If you're looking for a body wash that doesn't harm your skin and cares for it every day, it’s time to try Dove Hydrate body wash. Developed with 100% gentle cleansers, this mild and nourishing body wash works to cleanse and nourish skin, leaving it softer and smoother in just one shower. Specially formulated to to be mild and gentle to your skin, this body wash is made with 100% gentle cleansers and 0% sulfate SLES. It doesn't strip your skin's natural moisture so your skin stays hydrated and soft. It also nourishes your skin and is microbiome gentle.

Dove cares for all. Dove Hydrate body wash is a mild and gentle body wash that helps you turn every shower into an act of self-care. It gives you softer, smoother skin in just one shower. It also has a 92% biodegradable formula*, is packaged in 100% recycled plastic bottles** and is PETA Vegan approved.
*92% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water & minerals (OECD test methods 301,302 and/or 310).
Squeeze a generous amount of Dove Hydrate body wash into your palms. Massage the hydrating body wash onto your skin, then rinse off to reveal soft, smooth skin

Damp skin is more receptive to lotions and serums, so after showering is the perfect time to lock in moisture. After using a body wash apply your favourite Dove moisturiser as soon as you step out of the shower. Your skin will look and feel softer, as well as instantly more nourished.

At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look—reaching over ¼ of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030. We are also committed to a landmark new initiative as part of our 2025 commitment to reduce plastic waste; reducing over 20,500 metric tons of virgin plastic annually by making the iconic beauty bar packaging plastic-free globally; launching new 100% recycled plastic bottles; and trialing a new refillable deodorant format that reduces plastic use over time. As one of the largest beauty brands in the world, we are revealing an agenda-setting commitment to tackle the global beauty industry’s plastic waste issue.

features: A mild and caring body wash for your shower that gently cleanses for instantly softer, smoother skin.
Dove Hydrate body wash is made with 0% sulfate SLES so it gently cleanses your skin without stripping its natural moisture. Leaving it soft and smooth right from the shower.
This body cleanser gently but effectively washes away dirt and germs with a rich lather that won't dry out your skin.
Made with 100% gentle cleansers and 0% sulfate SLES for a hydrating shower experience.
This formula is dermatologically tested & approved. Made with skin nourishers & mild cleansers it gently cleanses your skin and nourishes its microbiome.
PETA vegan approved, made with 92% biodegradable ingredients* and uses 100% recycled plastic bottles**
*92% of ingredients break down into carbon dioxide, water & minerals (OECD test methods 301,302 and/or 310).
